Introduction¶

Task3¶

See module task3

This purpose of this project is to answer task3 of the homework assignment for Applied Machine Learning

The summary function in this module calculates the mean and standard deviation of a numpy dataset along a specified axis.

Standard Deviation

\[\sqrt{\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i - \overline{x})^2}\]

Mean

\[\frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^N (x_i)\]

See module task3

Task4¶

See module pair_plot

Creates a pair-plot of the iris dataset
